title: Font Help Please!
content:
Can anyone tell me what the Keeper Resources Inc. font is in their logo? It’s in the flash header, which takes a few seconds to appear after a bunch of text fades in and out.

[http://www.keeperresources.com/contact.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011917/http:/www.keeperresources.com/contact.php "http://www.keeperresources.com/contact.php")

Thanks!

 [‹ NEW! Type ID Pop Quiz V2.1.1 - Entry Level](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011917/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28886 "Go to previous forum topic") [type on receipts! help needed identifying font! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011917/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31426 "Go to next forum topic")
author: joesomebody

comments.content: A very classical Futura bold (or extra bold?)

[Optima expanded?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011917/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/medium/)  
but font used in navigations is Futura of course.
I thought it might be Optima too, but look at the eye of the **e**... it is very narrow... not Optima.
That “K” isn’t either — geez, they’re a 15-minute walk from our place!

Looks like a customised Friz Quadrata to me.

Nick Cooke
